name: Auto Layout Dialog
description:
A collection of dialogs for your projects. United under the same style but adaptable to many use cases.


  • Every dialog is built with Auto Layout.
  • You can easily customize the dialogs adding or removing contents modularly.
  • Colors are used as Styles, it's easy to change accent, text or background colors.


UPDATES

1.1

Bug correction: Long title automatically uses more lines.

New Feature: Added Dialog Builder to create dialogs from scratch easier.
